title: Non Sleezy File Sharing Service
content:
Is anyone using (or aware of) a file sharing service that doesn’t double as a portal to porn and illegal software distribution? Something simple to use that a client won’t be disturbed by?

 [‹ Font problem on Leopard - please help me............! somebody, anybody?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706090747/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40005 "Go to previous forum topic") [Languages ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706090747/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40054 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content:
Are you looking for a way to transfer large files? I’ve used this service sucessfully:

[http://www.yousendit.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706090747/http:/www.yousendit.com/ "http://www.yousendit.com")
DropSend.com is also very good if you are just looking to transfer larger files.
